article.headline: Coppin St 70, Howard 63
article.story: BALTIMORE (AP) -- Kelvin Green scored 17 points and pulled down seven rebounds as Coppin St. beat Howard 70-63 on Monday night. Coppin St. (13-12, 11-3 MEAC) led by two, 29-27, at halftime, but pulled away in the second half, when Howard (6-16, 4-9) shot 34 percent from the field. Howard, which shot only 31 percent from the field for the game, was led by Bilal Russell, who scored 15 points. Seye Aluko had 14 points and eight rebounds, and Derek Mitchell added 12 points and six rebounds for Howard. Coppin St. had 17 turnovers to Howard's 13, but Coppin St. shot 42 percent from the field and 73 percent, 32-for-44, from the free throw line. Henry Colter had 12 points and eight rebounds, and Nicholas King added 10 points for Coppin St. Howard was 8-for-30 for 27 percent from behind the 3-point line.
